name: Geomancer (Lasso Games)
description:
Made in 48 Hours for gm(48) #16 - Environment As A Weapon!

Bend the environment to do your bidding! Defend your castle and defeat the elementals that have come to overtake it! An homage to NES classics like Bubble Bobble and Snow Bros!

Visit http://gm48.net/?page=game&id=76 and drop us a rating! The ratings are the criteria for winning!
